get.summary: Get all artists with preview cards and collection progress.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search by artist name (case-insensitive substring match)

get.summary:
Get a paginated list of published blog posts.
Returns only Site/Staff posts that are published and public.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of posts per page (default: 20, max: 50)

get.summary:
Get a single published blog post by ID.
Returns only Site/Staff posts that are published and public.
Get all cards with optional filtering, sorting, and pagination.

parameters.name: rarity
parameters.description: Filter by rarity (comma-separated for OR, e.g., "Rare,Common")

parameters.name: supertype
parameters.description: Filter by supertype (comma-separated for OR, e.g., "Pokemon,Trainer")

parameters.name: subtype
parameters.description: Filter by subtype (comma-separated for OR, e.g., "Basic,GX")

parameters.name: pokemonType
parameters.description: Filter by Pokemon type (comma-separated for OR, e.g., "Fire,Water")

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: Sort field (Name, Number, Rarity, SetName). Default: SetName

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search by card name or number (case-insensitive substring match)

get.summary: Get a single card by ID with full details.

Get all variants of a card (Normal, Reverse Holo, etc.).
Returns all cards that share the same BaseExternalId.

post.summary:
Record a view for a card.
Uses fire-and-forget pattern - returns 202 Accepted immediately.

get.summary: Search cards by name or number.

Get available filter options based on existing card data.
Results are cached for performance.

Get all collections for the authenticated user.
Creates default collections (My Collection, Wishlist) on first access.

post.summary: Create a new collection for the authenticated user.

get.summary:
Get a single collection by ID.
Returns collection if owned by user or if collection is public.

put.summary:
Update an existing collection.
Only the collection owner can update.

delete.summary:
Delete a collection (soft delete).
Only the collection owner can delete. System collections and the default Wishlist cannot be deleted.
Users must have at least one collection of type Collection.

get.summary:
Get the count of unique cards collected per set across all Collection-type collections.
Returns a dictionary mapping SetId to unique card count.

Get collection counts broken down by variant type for a specific set.
Returns counts for each variant type (Normal, Reverse Holo, etc.) with collected/total.
Get paginated items in a collection.

post.summary: Add a card to a collection.
Bulk add items to a collection.

delete.summary: Bulk delete items from a collection.

get.summary: Get public collections for a user by display name.
Get a single public collection by display name and slug.
Get paginated items for a public collection.

requestBody.description: The contact form data containing name, email, subject, and message

429.description: Too many requests - rate limit exceeded

post.summary:
Add a card to favorites. Creates favorites collection on first use.
Idempotent - returns 200 if already favorited.

get.summary: Get paginated list of favorited cards.
Check if multiple cards are favorited (bulk operation).
Get all feature flags with their current enabled state.
Get a user's profile feed (public endpoint).

Lightweight registration status check for route guards.
Returns minimal data for quick checks.

Get full registration progress with step details.
Creates profile if it doesn't exist (lazy initialization).

post.summary:
Accept terms of service and privacy policy.
Step 1 of registration wizard.

get.summary: Generate AI-powered display name suggestions.
Check if a display name is available.

post.summary:
Set the user's display name.
Step 2 of registration wizard.

Select a subscription plan by type.
Step 3 of registration wizard.

Select a user preference preset.
Step 4 of registration wizard.

Complete the registration process.
Final step - validates all requirements are met.

get.summary: Get all card series with optional filtering and pagination.

parameters.name: tcgType
parameters.description: Filter by TCG type (Pokemon, Magic, YuGiOh)

parameters.name: seriesType
parameters.description: Filter by series type (Standard, Special, Promo)

get.summary: Get a single card series by ID.
Get a single card series by slug.
Get all card sets with optional filtering and pagination.

parameters.name: setType
parameters.description: Filter by set type (Base, Expansion, SpecialEdition)

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: Filter by locale (US, UK, Japan, etc.)

get.summary: Get a single card set by ID.
Get a single card set by slug.

parameters.name: seriesId
parameters.description: Optional series ID to disambiguate slugs

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: Optional locale to disambiguate slugs (default: US)

get.summary:
Get the master checklist for a card set, showing all cards grouped by number with their variants.
For authenticated users, includes collection status.
